sense.gloss: to quarry, to cut (timber), to cut and carry off
to begin to talk, to break the ice, to broach
to start a fire (with flint, by rubbing sticks together, etc.)
to select and extract (from a media file), to splice out

sdata.j: ↑挨拶↑↓あいさつ↓↑抜↑↓ぬ↓きでいきなり↑用件↑↓ようけん↓を↑切↑↓|き↓り↑出↑↓だ↓す|。
sdata.e: Skip the pleasantries and get down to business.
